subsection.name: Development snapshot
subsection.p: The latest snapshot build (usually uploaded in sync with this website) can be downloaded directly from here jtidyservlet.rar.

subsection.name: Releases (n/a)
subsection.p: You can download source and binary distributions from the SourceForge Server .

subsection.name: Source code from CVS (n/a)
subsection.p: You can also obtain the source from the SourceForge CVS Server, see Source Repository.

section.name: Files

ul.li: jtidyservlet.jar - the jar file that contains the taglib classes, you need to drop this file into your web application WEB-INF/lib directory.
jtidyservlet.tld - the tld file that contains the tag library descriptor, you need to drop this file into your web application WEB-INF directory.
jtidyservlet-webapp.war - the documentation and the example applications that appear on this web site, optionally drop this into your web container deployment directory.

section.p: The "src" versions includes the complete source code to the tag library, the various example pages, and the documentation.
